## Derivatives in R

```{r}
#create the expression for calculating derivative
fx    <- expression(3.1*(x^4)-28*x)
df_dx <-  D(fx, 'x')
x <- 10
eval(df_dx)
```

```{r}
gz    <- expression(2*z^3-10.5*z^2+4.1) 
dg_dz <-  D(gz, 'z')
z <- 3.6
eval(dg_dz)
```

Try it for the sequence

```{r}
gz    <- expression(2*z^3-10.5*z^2+4.1) 
dg_dz <-  D(gz, 'z')
z <- seq(from=1, to=3, length=20)
eval(dg_dz)
```
